" Ohhh SCRAP!" Here we go! "

With a quick screetch of the tires, Nightshif=
t speeds off to try and divert Slag and Sludge away from the main group.  F=
or an SUV Nightshift moves quickly and efficiently.

Perpetually on the mov=
e and constantly busy.

yclonus@...> wrote:

uick

om view.
